Bingo Card Book Recommendations

Bingo Card All Books

Name in the Title

Bingo Square [11]

A character’s first or last name appears in the title. Example: Gideon the Ninth. HARD MODE: The title has the character’s first and last name. Example: The First Fifteen Lives of Harry August.
